message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
Let's meet in the middle and split it evenly for now.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more due to the inflation.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm still not convinced you're getting the better deal.
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, but I still think I can get a better deal. Your turn to make a move.
I'm not getting desperate, but I'm willing to give you a bit more. Don't think you can get a better deal!
I'm getting close to giving up, but I still think I can squeeze out a better deal. You're getting closer to my minimum, but I'm not there yet.
I'm not getting any younger, and I think it's time for a serious offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm running out of options, but I'm still not giving up. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
This is my last chance to make a deal. Take it or leave it, Bob!
I've had enough. I'm taking nothing and leaving it all to you. You win.
